column5: I have a private room available in my four bedroom house where I reside with my roommate. I have recently redecorated it is a simple relaxing vibe that anyone will enjoy chilling in. Guests have access to the bathroom only three feet away from the room and there is a flat screen tv in room. Guests can opt for extra relaxation amenities such as laundry service, home cooked breakfast and or dinner for a small additional fee. There is also a licensed massage therapist available by appt.
